name: soulsifter
description: Scripts for automating builds of the backend & fronted of SoulSifter app.

scripts.all: npm run buildnumber && cd be && npm run be:compile && cd ../fe && npm run fe:start
scripts.package: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:package
scripts.packagedebug: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:packagedebug
scripts.release: npm run buildnumber && cd be && npm run be:compile && cd ../fe && npm run fe:build && npm run make
scripts.start: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:start
scripts.startforge: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:startforge
scripts.test: npm run buildnumber && cd be && npm run be:test

author: Robert Neale
